Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. This product holds immense value to us, but we believe it's worth even more to someone who can truly appreciate its capabilities. Considering its high quality and the benefits it offers, we're extending an exclusive opportunity to you. We propose a price of $9,500 for this exceptional item. We're confident that this investment will pay off in terms of functionality, efficiency, and long-term savings. Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any questions or need further details about the product. We look forward to the possibility of working with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
